description: More than a blockchain platform, PlatON introduces a trustless computing architecture to address scalability and privacy issues with advanced encryption algorithms including verifiable computing, homomorphic encryption, secure multiparty computing, and more. PlatON's technology allows the executing of more heavy, data-privacy smart contracts. For more information, please read the PlatON Technical White Paper.
summary: PlatON is a trustless computing network built on cryptographic algorithms
author: PlatON
